mapper.select: select movieId, poster, movieTitle, movieDate, cate1, cate2, buyPrice, rentalPrice from movie where movieId = #{movieId}

select m.movieId, m.movieTitle, m.poster, m.movieContent, m.movieDate, m.movieCheck, m.cate1, m.cate2, m.buyPrice, m.rentalPrice, m.movieUrl, ROUND(NVL(avg_rating.average_rating, 0), 2) AS rating from movie m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT movieId, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM rating GROUP BY movieId )avg_rating ON m.movieId = avg_rating.movieId order by movieId asc
